name: ExtractFiles
description: Extract a variety of archive and compression files such as .7z, .rar, .tar.gz, and .zip
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: archiveFilePatterns
inputs.label: Archive file patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: File paths or patterns of the archive files to extract.  Supports multiple lines of minimatch patterns.  [More Information](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=800269)

inputs.name: destinationFolder
inputs.label: Destination folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Destination folder into which archive files should be extracted.  Use [variables](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988) if files are not in the repo. Example: $(agent.builddirectory)

inputs.name: cleanDestinationFolder
inputs.label: Clean destination folder before extracting
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to clean the destination directory before archive contents are extracted into it.

inputs.name: overwriteExistingFiles
inputs.label: Overwrite existing files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to overwrite existing files in the destination directory.

inputs.name: pathToSevenZipTool
inputs.label: Path to 7z utility
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can specify custom path to 7z utility. For example, "C:\7z\7z.exe" on Windows and "/usr/local/bin/7z" on MacOS/Ubuntu.

messages.ExtractDirFailedinFindFiles: Specified archive: %s can not be extracted because it is a directory.
messages.ExtractNotFileFailed: Specified archive: %s can not be extracted because it is not a file.
messages.ExtractNotAccessibleFile: Specified archive: %s can not be extracted because it can not be accessed: %s
messages.SearchNonExistDir: Search failed because the specified search directory: %s does not exist.
messages.SearchNonDir: Search failed because the specified search directory: %s is not a directory.
messages.NoSearchPatternPath: No path specified for search pattern: %s defaulting to: %s
messages.ExtractFileFailedMsg:
Extraction failed for file: %s 
code: %d 
stdout: %s 
stderr: %s 
error: %s;
messages.ExtractNonExistFile: Extraction failed for file: %s because it does not exist.
messages.ExtractDirFailed: Extraction failed for file: %s because it is a directory.
messages.ExtractFailedCannotCreate: Extraction failed for file: %s because temporary location could not be created: %s
messages.NoFilesFound: No archives were found using specified file patterns
